item.title: Predicting atmospheric turbulence for secure quantum communications in free space
item.author: lukasscarfe@gmail.com (Lukas Scarfe)
item.description: We present a machine learning approach to forecast atmospheric turbulence ($C_n^2$) up to 12 hours in advance. By predicting channel conditions, we can determine optimal timing for secure key exchange in free-space quantum networks.
